title: U.S.: Citibank to Open Four New Branches in the Bay Area
summary: San Francisco – Banking just got simpler for consumers and businesses in Northern California with Citibank's announcement that it will open four new branches in the Bay Area in the coming months. Two of the branches, located in Fremont and Redwood City, opened today. Citibank will open additional branches in Campbell and San Jose by early next year, with more throughout 2012 and 2013.
tag-1: U.S.: Citibank to Open Four New Branches in the Bay Area
tag-3: San Francisco – Banking just got simpler for consumers and businesses in Northern California with Citibank's announcement that it will open four new branches in the Bay Area in the coming months. Two of the branches, located in Fremont and Redwood City, opened today. Citibank will open additional branches in Campbell and San Jose by early next year, with more throughout 2012 and 2013.
tag-4: "We are thrilled to make it easier for our Northern California customers to bank with us and proud to enhance our ability to serve this crucial market," said Rebecca Macieira-Kaufmann, President of Citibank California. "Citibank is committed to meeting the needs of consumers and businesses in the Bay Area and beyond, and through additional branches we can help even more customers reach their goals and dreams."
tag-5: The new Bay Area branches will feature envelope-free ATMs and showcase Citibank's differentiated level of customer service from its highly trained staff. The branches will service retail, small business, commercial banking, wealth management and mortgage customers with account opening and teller services, as well as 24-hour banking with lobby ATMs. The branches will also provide Citi's premium banking services and wealth management through Citigold.
tag-6: "Our branch expansion plans come on the heels of our announcement that Citibank will provide $24 billion in small business lending over the next three years," said Macieira-Kaufmann. "Small businesses are the engine of the California economy, and Citibank is committed to serving them and helping them grow."
tag-8: Branch hours are Monday through Friday, 9 a.m. - 6 p.m., and Saturday from 9 a.m. - 4 p.m. Customers can also conduct their banking through Citibank Online, Citi Mobile and Citi Phone Banking.
tag-9: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
